body: So what version is the server on currently?
body_tagged: So what version is the server on currently?
title: Version of the Server

replies.body: I could be wrong but its 1.6 and 1.7
replies.body_tagged: I could be wrong but its 1.6 and 1.7

replies.body: I tried 1.7 got connection time outs and crashes :l
replies.body_tagged: I tried 1.7 got connection time outs and crashes :l

replies.body: Well try 1.7.10, mojang is having many difficulties making MC work lately
replies.body_tagged: Well try 1.7.10, mojang is having many difficulties making MC work lately

replies.body: Yep read up on the news I keep crashing oh well :l
replies.body_tagged: Yep read up on the news I keep crashing oh well :l

replies.body: I use 1.7.10 and sometimes it takes me three login attempts to join the server. It times out sometimes but it's not that big a deal for me as I just keep trying and it eventually works.
replies.body_tagged: I use 1.7.10 and sometimes it takes me three login attempts to join the server. It times out sometimes but it's not that big a deal for me as I just keep trying and it eventually works.

replies.body: I use 1.7.4 - 1.7.9, I get no crashes, time outs or major lag.
